Title: Oraa Guzura Dado (1987)
Description:
['Remake of the first series.', '
', '
', '
', '
When Mt. Bikkura erupts a huge egg one day, a chubby little dinosaur name Guzura hatches out of it. The series follows his misadventures as he interacts with humans as well as other animals and creatures']
Staff: [['Kinoshita, Renzo', 'Episode Director'], ['Yamanaka, Norimasa', 'Theme Song Arrangement'], ['Kishi, Masayuki', 'Theme Song Composition'], ['Sasagawa, Hiroshi', 'Original Creator']]
